definitions.title: v.b.
definitions.body: slay (poet.and late) (Ar. qatala, Eth. qatala: Sab. [[קתל]] Hom:Chrest.126, all slay (orig. form with [[ת]]; changed later, after [[ק]]); Aram. [[קְטַל]], qt.al; OAram. [[קטל]], [[כטל]], [[קתל]]);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. c. acc. pers., 3 ms. [[יִקְטָל־]] Job 24:14; sf., subj. God, [[יִקְטְלֵנִי]] Job 13:15; of God also 2 ms. [[תִּקְטׂל]] Ps 139:19.
